story:
You walk along. By afternoon, you reach a small town called Rehdek. You book in at a nice hotel
and go to sleep. In the middle of the night, you wake up. All you hear is screaming.
The room is shaking violently back and forth in a 7.7 magnitude earthquake. Do you try to
go back to sleep, scream, run to the window, call 911, do nothing, lie down on the floor
and cover yourself up with a blanket, stand in a doorway, climb out the window
and on to the roof of the hotel and start screaming, or jump out of the window?
